title: Executive Order 6923-Exclusion of Lands From the Harney National Forest
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 4, 1897 (ch. 2, 30 Stat. 11, 36; U.S.C., title 16, sec. 473), and upon the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture, it is ordered that Tps. 3 and 4 S., R. 6 E., and the E. ½ of Tps. 3 and 4 S., R. 5 E., Black Hills meridian, be, and they are hereby, excluded from the Harney National Forest as defined by proclamation of May 16, 1911 (37 Stat. 1680).
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6923-Exclusion of Lands From the Harney National Forest Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373465
